### Exercise 1 Pipeline 1
```{r cars}
# exercise pipeline 1
data <- cars
head(data)

data$log_speed <- log(data$speed)
data$log_dist <- log(data$dist)

data$dist_bin <- cut(data$dist, breaks = 3, labels = c("short", "medium", "long"))

summary(data)
```
